nodes.text: Buy Republic War Bonds was a propaganda poster used by the Grand Army of the Republic during the late portion of the Clone Wars, and created by Janyor of Bith. It depicted two Phase II clone troopers, a shock trooper, as well as Commander Bacara standing in a cityscape as well as a red and black banner overhead with the Galactic Republic logo and the words in High Galactic "Buy Republic War Bonds," with the colors of each word being the inverse of the banner. At the bottom was a message in High Galactic stating it was a message from the reader's Republic benefactors.
